name: The apprentice (itch) (dreamerflow)
description: You need to collect some items to mix and open the portals, you are an alchemist apprentice, for the first portal you need to drop two rocks and one nest in the vessel, in the second 2 rocks +2 ice +1 nest, and in the puzzle you must put the boxes in the fire sýmbol. You can shoot ice to the fireballs with keyboard E
